Subject: Greetings from planet Zog!
Paragraphs:
Dear Snickerdoodle,

Greetings from the planet Zog! I hope this email finds you doing the hokey-pokey while juggling pineapples in a tutu. I myself am currently sitting in a bathtub filled with jellybeans, sipping on a smoothie made of moon rocks and star dust.

Speaking of moon rocks, did you know that they have the power to make your hair grow backwards? It's true! I tried it myself and now I have a full head of hair on my chin.

Anyway, enough about me. How are you doing? Are you still wearing your socks on your hands and your gloves on your feet? I hope so, because that's the only way to keep the purple giraffes from stealing your toothbrush.

Well, I must go now. I have a date with a unicorn and we're going to ride rainbows into the sunset. Take care, and don't forget to brush your teeth with pickle juice!

Sincerely,
Gloop Glorp
